It's not easy to throw you off your game.
No matter what life sends your way, you always take it in stride.
And when you've got a goal in mind, it's impossible to stop you from reaching it.
You're also quite protective of your close friends and family.
Around them, you're able to let your guard down and relax a little.
Of course, sometimes it can be hard for others to get through your hard, rough exterior.
But the people who do will find a wonderful, caring friend beneath it.
A tough person like you will be...
